EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Single Page App-Spring Security-AngularJS.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: A Single-Page Application with Spring Security and Angular JS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar A Single-Page Application with Spring Security and Angular JS with David Syer. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, March 10, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e45c5c49bd89364cf3c822c5f0682df68>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 666 583 046
Thank you,
